Press the attributes button . The attributes side panel is displayed

If the attribute is present in the attributes table (i.e. already has a value), you can change its value by tapping/clicking its value. If the attribute is not shown, press the See all attributes. Tap or click the attribute to set its value

section.title: Saving a modified XML document
section.p: To save your changes, tap or click the save button from the top of the page. Note that the open and save operations depend on the integration of the oXygen XML Author WebApp with a CMS or other storage mechanism.
